text: Moshi kare-ra ga arrā to shito kara jibun-tachi ni atae rareta mono ni manzoku surunaraba, kō iubekideatta. `Arrā wa, watashi-tachi ni totte banzende ara remasu. Arrā to shito wa, sono megumi ni yori (sarani ōku o) watashi-tachi ni atae rarerudeshou. Watashi-tachi wa (tadashī michi o fumu yō) arrā ni tangan shimasu
